sk1.name: Earth Spike
sk1.desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

sk2.name: Hex
sk2.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

sk3.name: Mana Drain
sk3.desc: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

sk4.name: Finger of Death
sk4.desc: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
